## FiletreeBuilderOptions.keyMap property

Custom key mappings for filetree navigation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
keyMap?: FiletreeKeyMap;
```

## Remarks

Provides control over which keys trigger navigation actions like moving up/down. If not provided, uses default key bindings.
